Package managers

Class StaffSystem

java.lang.Object
managers.AbstractSystem
managers.StaffSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
CourseSystemInterface, StudentSystemInterface, Systems
public class StaffSystem
extends AbstractSystem
implements StudentSystemInterface, CourseSystemInterface
Controller for the staff system. Used to pass user inputs from UI classes to entity manager classes Also used to invoke entity manager methods based on user actions from UI classes

    • StaffSystem

      public StaffSystem​(java.lang.String userId) throws FileReadingException
      Constructor Used to instantiated only if a staff user has successfully logged in to system
      Parameters:
      userId - User ID of the staff user logged in to the system
      Throws:
      FileReadingException - thrown if files cannot be read or found

      Method to select a course used for other methods See CourseSystemInterface.selectCourse(String) method;
      Specified by:
      selectCourse in interface CourseSystemInterface
      Parameters:
      courseCode - course code of the course
      Throws:
      KeyNotFoundException - thrown if the course code does not match any in the system

    • selectIndex

      public void selectIndex​(java.lang.String indexNo) throws KeyNotFoundException, MissingSelectionException
      Method to select an index used for other methods See CourseSystemInterface.selectIndex(String) method
      Specified by:
      selectIndex in interface CourseSystemInterface
      Parameters:
      indexNo - index number of the index
      Throws:
      KeyNotFoundException - Used if no indexes match the given index number can be found for the course
      MissingSelectionException - Used if the course has not yet been selected

      Specified by:

    • selectLessonDetails

      public void selectLessonDetails​(java.lang.String lessonVenue, java.lang.String lessonType, int lessonDay, int evenOdd, java.time.LocalTime startTime, java.time.LocalTime endTime) throws MissingParametersException, OutOfRangeException
      Used to create lesson details used for other methods User needs to input arguments for LessonDetailMaker.makeLessonDetails() method
      Parameters:
      lessonVenue - Venue of lesson
      lessonType - Type of lesson
      lessonDay - DayOfWeek of lesson
      evenOdd - int indicating weeks lesson is held (0. Even weeks, 1. Odd weeks, 2. All weeks)
      startTime - Start time of lesson
      endTime - End time of lesson
      Throws:
      MissingParametersException - thrown if arguments required are missing
      OutOfRangeException - thrown if inputs are outside acceptable constraints (See LessonDetailMaker.makeLessonDetails())

    • updateAccessPeriod

      public void updateAccessPeriod​(java.time.LocalDateTime[] newAccessPeriod) throws FileReadingException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.io.IOException, KeyNotFoundException
      Method to change the access period for the course selected
      Parameters:
      newAccessPeriod - LocalDateTime array indicating new access period
      Throws:
      FileReadingException - thrown if student file cannot be accessed
      java.io.IOException - thrown if file cannot be read
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - thrown if file is read but contains the wrong class
      KeyNotFoundException - thrown if selectedStudent is not within system

    • addStudent

      public java.lang.String addStudent​(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String gender, java.lang.String nationality, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String matricNo, java.time.LocalDateTime[] accessPeriod, java.lang.String password) throws KeyClashException, FileReadingException, MissingParametersException
      Method to create new student and add to system
      Parameters:
      userId - UserID of new student. Must be unique
      name - Name of new student
      gender - Gender of new student
      nationality - Nationality of new student
      email - Email address of new student
      matricNo - Matriculation number of new student
      accessPeriod - Access period of new student
      password - Password for new userID
      Returns:
      String with list of students
      Throws:
      KeyClashException - thrown if details required to be unique are not
      FileReadingException - thrown if new file cannot be created
      MissingParametersException - thrown if any above fields are null

    • updateCourse

      public void updateCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String courseName, School school) throws KeyClashException, MissingSelectionException
      Method to update the courseCode, courseName and school of a course To change other details about the course, use the updateIndex, addIndex, or removeIndex method
      Parameters:
      courseCode - New course code
      courseName - New course name
      school - new school hosting course
      Throws:
      MissingSelectionException - thrown if course has yet to be selected
      KeyClashException - thrown if new course code is not unique

    • updateIndex

      public void updateIndex​(java.lang.String indexNo, int slotsTotal) throws OutOfRangeException, KeyClashException, MissingSelectionException, InvalidInputException, KeyNotFoundException
      Method to change index number and total capacity of an index
      Parameters:
      indexNo - index number to be changed to
      slotsTotal - New total capacity of index
      Throws:
      OutOfRangeException - thrown if slotsTotal is less than number of students currently registered for index
      KeyClashException - thrown if indexNo is not unique within the course
      MissingSelectionException - thrown if course or index have yet to be selected
      InvalidInputException - thrown if any input is found to be invalid (e.g: if any are null)
      KeyNotFoundException - thrown if selected index cannot be found under selected course

    • addIndex

      public void addIndex​(java.lang.String indexNo, int slotsTotal) throws KeyClashException, MissingParametersException, OutOfRangeException
      Method to create a new index for an existing course in the system
      Parameters:
      indexNo - Index number of new index
      slotsTotal - Total number of slots in index
      Throws:
      KeyClashException - thrown if indexNo is not unique within the course
      MissingParametersException - thrown if course or timetable is yet to be selected. See selectCourse(String) and selectLessonDetails(String, String, int, int, LocalTime, LocalTime)
      OutOfRangeException - thrown if slotsTotal is insufficient

    • addCourse

      public void addCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String courseName, School school, int acadU) throws KeyClashException, OutOfRangeException
      Method to add course to system using CourseMgr.createCourse(String, String, School, int) method
      Parameters:
      courseCode - Course code of new course
      courseName - Name of new course
      school - School hosting new course
      acadU - Academic units carried by new course
      Throws:
      KeyClashException - Thrown if courseCode is not unique
      OutOfRangeException - Thrown if acadU is insufficient

    • checkAvailableVacancies

      public int checkAvailableVacancies() throws MissingSelectionException
      Method to retrieve vacancies available to the selected index
      Returns:
      number of slots empty for selected index
      Throws:
      MissingSelectionException - thrown if course or index have yet to be selected

    • printStudentsbyIndex

      public java.lang.String printStudentsbyIndex​(boolean b) throws MissingSelectionException
      Method to view all students registered for an index
      Parameters:
      b - whether or not to see detailed info about students in index
      Returns:
      String of student info registered/slot capacity for index
      Throws:
      MissingSelectionException - thrown if course or index are yet to be selected

    • printStudentsbyCourse

      public java.lang.String printStudentsbyCourse() throws MissingSelectionException
      Method to view all students registered in a course
      Returns:
      String of all students in course
      Throws:
      MissingSelectionException - thrown if course has yet to be selected

      public java.lang.String getCourseInfo() throws MissingSelectionException
      Method to retrieve information about a course, including students registered
      Returns:
